items.sentence: Tom is the only one here that can speak French.
Tom told me that he\'d like to become a doctor.
Tom wasn\'t used to having someone wait on him.
I\'ve attached the document that you requested.
It\'s been almost 30 years since the war ended.
Tom already knows I\'m not very happy about it.
Tom already knows where he\'s going to do that.
Can you tell me how to get to the Hilton Hotel?
Can you tell me how you found out what Tom did?
Can you verify that this message came from Tom?
